comments.body: To avoid clutter: `diverged from & newer than` is kinda the default (unless you only ever do reviews and no coding yourself xD) and `diverged from & older than` is typically more of an exceptional situation
I tried `diverged from & newer than` in CLI at first but it was overly verbose
Fine!  I think that a short comment about it would be nice :speech_balloon:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@        Case($(Ahead), "ahead of " + remoteName),
        Case($(Behind), "behind " + remoteName),
        // To avoid clutter we omit `& newer than` part in status label, coz this is default situation
        Case($(DivergedAndNewerThanRemote), "diverged from " + remoteName),
        Case($(DivergedAndOlderThanRemote), "diverged from & older than " + remoteName),
